programme.title: Devoured
programme.desc: Four people die from a listeria outbreak after Blue Bell Ice Cream refuses to pull its product from the shelves, but Texans stand by their brand with almost cult-like devotion.

programme.title: Devoured
programme.desc: Paul Dennis Reid Jr. unleashes a reign of terror, committing seven brutal murders and targeting fast food chains for the same reason regular customers do: it's quick and easy.

programme.title: Devoured
programme.desc: Cheating on your wife is a recipe for disaster, but at the World Famous Carnegie Deli infidelity and a stolen recipe put the culturally iconic restaurant in quite a pickle.

programme.title: Devoured
programme.desc: In what was probably one of the largest bee heists in history, California's Central Valley fell victim to having hundreds of bee hives stolen by some thieves with sticky fingers.
